title: 133. Why You’re Successful & Ambitious and Struggle With Dating
itunes:title: Why You’re Successful & Ambitious and Struggle With Dating
description:
In this episode of the Self Love Fix podcast, we’re talking about how being successful, ambitious, and accomplished can sometimes actually stand in your way when it comes to dating.

We sometimes have the tendency to treat dating like a job interview, which doesn’t really lend itself to a successful love life. I’m dropping some tips on how to get out of your own way when it comes to dating, allowing yourself to better connect with love interests.

In this episode we cover:

  • Dating is Not Like Job Hunting 
  • Sharing Your Interests & Passion
  • Being Open to Help & Support 

Once you begin looking at your love life differently and sharing your magnetism, you’ll find that it’s easier to forge those amazing connections that could open the door to true love.

If you liked this episode of the podcast, take a screenshot, head on over to my Instagram and share it on your IG stories and tag me, @theselflovefix

If you love what you learned, be sure to hit that follow button so you never miss a future episode, and make sure to leave a review to help me reach more listeners just like you looking to follow their inner truth and live a life of abundance & authentic self-love.

 

CONNECT WITH BEATRICE:

Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/theselflovefix 

Website: http://www.beatricekamau.com 

 

EPISODE RESOURCES:

Join the waitlist for my LIVE dating program coming in January 2022. Save your early access spot today before it closes: https://beatricekamau.com/datingsos
